jma::JMA_UserDictionary

jma::JMA_UserDictionary Class Reference

JMA_UserDictionary is a collection of user dictionaries shared by multiple threads. More...

Detailed Description

JMA_UserDictionary is a collection of user dictionaries shared by multiple threads.
